details.title: Dispersion compensation of 50 km SMF optical transmission systems with a linearly chirped fiber grating
details.abstract: A linearly chi rped fiber grating was written by tilting the fiber with a uniform phase mask. A bandwidth of 0. 25 nm was produced. Dispersion compensation over 50 km of standard single mode fiber (SMF) was demonstrated using this chirped fiber grating. A figure of merit of 0.88 was achieved with near perfect recompresson.
